properties.displayName: AD FS Remote Auth Sync Connection - [WC-BASE]
properties.description:
Detects suspicious AD FS authentication activity potentially indicating unauthorized replication or configuration extraction attempts. This detection identifies authentication tokens issued on AD FS servers and correlates them with inbound HTTP traffic (port 80) from external hosts. These patterns may reflect a threat actor attempting to exploit AD FS endpoints for sensitive data like configuration settings or token-signing certificates.
References: 
https://docs.microsoft.com/windows-server/identity/ad-fs/troubleshooting/ad-fs-tshoot-logging
https://twitter.com/OTR_Community/status/1387038995016732672
